title: “Will NFL Defenses Ever Be Able to Stop Quarterbacks?”
description:
Kevin is joined by ESPN’s Domonique Foxworth to discuss the origins of the league's offensive boom and how defenses have to game plan against today’s explosive offenses. Then Kevin speaks with Pro Football Focus’s Seth Galina about their favorite defensive coordinator and the different schemes used in today’s NFL. 

Host: Kevin Clark 
Guests: Domonique Foxworth and Seth Galina
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
